# Add Member to Card

# Description

Add a card member in Trello.

# Untitled Section

# Configuration

Member ID - Type the name of the member to select it from the dropdown list or
            enter a member ID. This field supports String type input.Card ID - Type the name of the card to select it from the dropdown list or
            enter a card ID. This field supports String type input.





* Cards members - Automatically generated output variable.
